step.datasource:
SELECT distinct
a.HID as HeaderID , 'V' as ord_soort , '1' as betaald , '0' as ordbv_afdr , 'S_' + cast(a.HID as varchar(50)) AS refer , isnull(cast(ltrim(rtrim(a.FreeTextField_02)) as varchar(max)), '') + '/' + isnull(cast(ltrim(rtrim(a.FreeTextField_03))as varchar(max)), '') AS refer1 , a.FreeTextField_06 AS refer2 , a.FreeTextField_04 as docnumber , 'EUR' as Valcode , c.debnr as debnr , c2.debnr as verzdebnr , 'S20' as Magcode , 'ZZ_OP' as kstplcode , a.FreeTextField_10 as selcode , '0' as colli , '0' as Netto_gew , '0' as Bruto_gew , a.RequestComments as Note , 'Retour te ontvangen: ' + cast(rtrim(ltrim(a.ItemCode)) as varchar(max)) + '/sn:' + cast(rtrim(ltrim(a.FreeTextField_05)) as varchar(max)) as freefield1 , a.FreeIntField_03 as fakt_code FROM [400].dbo.cicmpy AS vic (nolock) INNER JOIN dbo.cicmpy AS c (nolock) ON vic.debnr = c.debnr INNER JOIN dbo.Absences AS a (nolock) ON c.cmp_wwn = a.CustomerID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.cicntp AS ci (nolock) ON a.CustomerContactID = ci.cnt_id INNER JOIN dbo.cicmpy AS c2 (nolock) ON a.FreeGuidField_01 = c2.cmp_wwn INNER JOIN [400].dbo.cicmpy AS vic2 (nolock) ON c2.debnr = vic2.debnr left outer join dbo.orkrg ok on ok.refer = 'S_' + cast(a.hid as varchar(50))
WHERE 1=1 AND (a.Type = 610) AND (a.FreeBoolField_01 = 1) AND (a.FreeBoolField_05 = 0) and ok.id is null
Group by a.HID , a.FreeTextField_02 , a.FreeTextField_03 , a.FreeTextField_04 , a.FreeTextField_05 , a.FreeTextField_06 , a.FreeTextField_10 , a.RequestComments , c.debnr , c2.debnr , a.Itemcode , a.FreeIntField_03

select
l.HID as HeaderID , l.Itemcode as artcode , l.esr_aantal , Case when (l.Tekst is not null) then (l.Tekst) else (l.oms45) end AS oms45 ,Case when (l.Tekst is not null) then (l.Tekst) else (l.oms45) end AS TextDescription
from [400].dbo.cicmpy AS vic (nolock) INNER JOIN dbo.cicmpy AS c ON vic.debnr = c.debnr INNER JOIN dbo.Absences AS a ON c.cmp_wwn = a.CustomerID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.cicntp AS ci ON a.CustomerContactID = ci.cnt_id INNER JOIN dbo.cicmpy AS c2 ON a.FreeGuidField_01 = c2.cmp_wwn INNER JOIN [400].dbo.cicmpy AS vic2 ON c2.debnr = vic2.debnr
cross apply (values ( a.HID , 'TXT-RGL' , '1' , a.FreeTextField_01 , NULL),
( a.HID , 'TXT-RGL' , '1' , NULL , 'Retour te ontvangen: ' + cast(rtrim(ltrim(a.ItemCode)) as varchar) + '/sn:' + cast(rtrim(ltrim(a.FreeTextField_05)) as varchar)) ) l (HID, Itemcode, esr_aantal, Tekst, oms45)
WHERE 1=1 AND (a.Type = 610) AND (a.FreeBoolField_01 = 1) AND (a.FreeBoolField_05 = 0)

SELECT er.newkeyvalue as Ordernumber, at.AttachmentFileName as BinaryFileName, at.Attachment as BinaryDocument, at.AttachmentFileName as subject, 221 as type, 1 as status from [abei].dbo._AB_Entity_results as er with (nolock) inner join [400].dbo.orkrg as ok with (nolock) on er.newkeyvalue collate Latin1_General_CI_AS = ok.ordernr inner join dbo.absences as ab with (nolock) on ab.hid = er.headerid collate Latin1_General_CI_AS inner join dbo.Attachments at on ab.ID = at.Entity where 1=1 and er.jobid = '%jobid%' and er.runid = '%runid%' and er.entity = 'SalesOrderHeader' and er.rowstatus = 2 AND (ab.Type = 610) AND (ab.FreeBoolField_01 = 1) AND (ab.FreeBoolField_05 = 0)

select top 100 percent a.ID, 1 as freeboolfield_05, min(o.ordernr) as freetextfield_11 from [orlaco].dbo.Absences a with (nolock) inner join [ABEI].dbo._AB_Entity_results_log r with (nolock) on r.property = 'Reference' and r.valueString = 'S_' + cast(a.hid as varchar(50)) inner join dbo.orkrg o with (nolock) on 'S_' + cast(a.hid as varchar(50)) = o.refer where 1=1 and r.jobid = '%jobid%' and r.runid = '%runid%' Group by a.ID
